name: Borei Corp
overview:
Borei is an entertainment technology company with patent-pending proprietary solutions that revolutionize the play experience of toys and games.

Borei’s technology brings to life your TV, movie, comic book and video game characters by injecting them with the ability to ‘play back’ – With Borei, your TOYS PLAY BACK! (TM).

Boreiâ€™s patent-pending technologies feature a modular design that easily and efficiently transforms play experiences in plush toys, action figure lines, and games . Boreiâ€™s FlexSenseTM brings toys to life through touch/proximity sensors and audio-visual sensor functions embedded onto a proprietary flexible substrate. Boreiâ€™s Encounter PlatformTM is a hardware and software platform that enables better communication between toy and user, and can easily be refreshed with new personalities, features, and games through an easy consumer download.

The light-weight flexible boards paradoxically can accommodate a huge density of circuits and components, which enable the toymaker to incorporate more toy functions on the board itselfâ€”cutting manufacturing costs while at the same time streamlining quality control.

Our world-class partners are ready to take your orders and are equipped to manufacture modules at the highest volume. Our manufacturing partners currently make parts for billions of consumer electronics devices that use similar technology, so the manufacturing processes are well understood and reliable.

Together, these technologies are truly game-changing for the toy industry. With Borei Technology, YOUR TOYS PLAY BACK. TM
